pages.title: Spellcasting Decoded
pages.text: I may have been a competent spellcaster, but I certainly never achieved true mastery, so my tutelage cannot be considered gospel. The old masters, sticklers though they were, had the foresight to write self-writing books on the fabric of the universe.

So with the right materials, you can imbue books with their otherwise lost knowledge. For now, lets get you started with a $(item)Spellforger's Codex$().$(br2)Note: $(item)Leather$() can be obtained by summoning cows with the $(item)Ritual Table$()
